short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share to Facebook, Twitter, Gmail and more using the context menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
you can share the current webpage or any link on the web page from context menu.

you can add/remove services to keep the menu customized to your requirement.

The services provided are but not limited to:
- Several social media
- Imgur
- GBookmarks
- Gmail
- Maps
- Translate
